response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its unique attributes and the unparalleled quality it embodies, we believe it is worth more than $1,000,000 to you. Therefore, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product exclusively for you at a price of $950,000. This exclusive deal is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to appreciate the significance of this transaction. We are confident that this investment will not only fulfill your needs but also exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
